text:
Carmen Antimo Argenziano (October 27, 1943 – February 10, 2019) was an American actor. He was best known for playing Jacob Carter on "Stargate SG-1".
Argenziano also starred on "Booker", "L.A. Law", "Melrose Place", and "The Young and the Restless". He had a small role in "The Godfather Part II" and "The Accused".
Argenziano died on February 10, 2019 in Los Angeles at the age of 75.
